name: Turkey Quesadillas
description: You’ve made enough soup with leftover holiday turkey to feed your family for an entire year. We’re obviously exaggerating…but here’s another way to use up those leftovers in a more creative way.

ingredients.name: grated Monterey Jack or cheddar cheese

preparation: Combine turkey, peppers, cheese and Fajita Seasoning.
Place half the tortillas on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Divide filling among tortillas. Top each with second tortilla.
Bake 8 minutes, turn over and bake an additional 8 minutes, or until lightly golden and cheese is melted.
tips: Serve with prepared Epicure Poco Picante Salsa, Epicure Guacamole and sour cream.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
